content.query:
/* Add a schema for all staging tables*/
CREATE SCHEMA [staging]

/* Create a staging table to keep cleaned file results*/
CREATE TABLE [staging].[Covid_Data]
(
    id int NOT NULL
    ,Date_updated datetime not NULL
    ,CasesConfirmed int
    ,ConfirmedChange INT
    ,Deaths INT
    ,DeathsChange INT 
	,Recovered INT 
	,RecoveredChange INT 
	,Latitude [nvarchar](50) 
	,Longitude [nvarchar](50) 
	,ISO2 [nvarchar](5) 
	,ISO3 [nvarchar](5) 
	,Country [nvarchar](50) 
	,Region1 [nvarchar](50) 
	,Region2 [nvarchar](50) 
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (id),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
